title: Wednesday Post Show (6-23-21)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (6-23-21)
description:
Bobby talks about working at the Opry last night with Reba. Bobby recommends going on a Tuesday night to see the bigger artists. Bobby also talks about seeing Carly Pearce backstage on the night she got invited to join the Opry. He also talks about how he had to fill 16 minutes of time doing stand up while Reba was changing clothes. We also check in with Eddie who is driving back from his walk.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
